column2: Prescription drugs cost least at Costco and most at CVS-study March 28 Some of the most popular prescription drugs that recently became available in generic form are sold at the lowest prices at Costco and at the highest prices at CVS Caremark
column3: according to an analysis by Consumer Reports.

column2: U.S. judge rejects defense arguments in BNY Mellon forex case NEW YORK
column3: March 28 A U.S. judge said on Thursday he was sympathetic to the U.S. government's use of a 1989 law against Bank of New York Mellon Corp in a lawsuit accusing it of overcharging clients for trading currencies
